product_title: Glam Touch - Premium Quality Full Coverage (80x30) Diamond Georgette Hijab - Available in 30+ Color

detail.name: Glam Touch - Premium Quality Full Coverage (80x30) Diamond Georgette Hijab - Available in 30+ Color

details.description_text: Brand: Glam Touch. Materials: Non-Transparent Original Diamond Georgette. 100% Authentic Product & QC Controlled. Soft to touch and easy to drape and style. Semi Stretchable Fabric wills Give You a Perfect Fit. Lightweight & breathable material & Wrinkle-resistant fabric You Will Get Extra Coverage because it’s a Full Coverage Size Hijab. We used Soft Premium Diamond Georgette for Best Feeling & Rough Use. Accurate in Length- 80 inch x Wide 30 Inch QC Finishing & Quality Checked If You Looking for Best Quality Hijab and Modest Accessories , Then Glam Touch will be Your Best Option. “Glam Touch” is a popular “Women’s Clothing Brand” Serving Nationally Since -2019.Our mission is to become the leading Modest Fashion brand for Muslim Women, with the Motto “Glamour of Modesty”We Have More Than 500+ Product Variation, We are mostly popular for modest Muslim wear like; HIJAB, NIQAB JILBAB, KHIMAR, KAFTAN, DESIGNER ABAYAS, CAPES as well as semi-western and traditional dresses. We have so many collections of Ready (Stitch) long and semi-long gowns that's one of our signature items. Our premium hijab and premium Abayas spreads love among hijab lovers. We firmly believe that Clients' Happiness is timeless. We are continuously working to change the Conventional and Upsetting trends and raise expectations and Making Exception for ensuring modern Muslim woman looks confident in modesty and more importantly how she feels.Details of Our Premium Quality Full Coverage Diamond Georgette Plain Hijab:Why Our Hijab are Special: Our Hijab Special in its Size and Coverage 80/30 inch.Client Satisfaction: Who already bought from us can tell you about the quality of our fabrics. We provide the best quality diamond fabrics, which are very soft and will not fade permanently even after repeated pinning, for long time use. Low-quality fabrics are shinier in the beginning, but the color becomes pale after a few days of use, but the gloss of good fabrics is a little less, but it remains for a long time.Match With Picture: Ordering online means trusting with your eyes closed, we use the original picture of each of our products to pay for your trust, and you will get a real match with the picture, you will not be disappointed, In Sha Allah.Quality Stitching and QC Finishing: Each of our hijabs are beautifully piqued around the edges, which won't fray easily, or have any fear of side-splitting, and original hijabs will be tagged with our glam touch.Packaging: It is our responsibility that your ordered product reaches you beautifully intact so packaging is a very important thing, we have made a beautiful box for Hijab comb, only if you order full comb (5 pcs) this box will be given which will not break easily, and Hope your parcel arrives in good condition.
